basics.name: Jishnu Nair
basics.label: Technology Analyst, Data Science Enthusiast
basics.summary: Jishnu hails from Kerala, India. He is currently pursuing the "Certificate of Business Analytics" certificate programme from Indian School of Business, Hyderabad. He works as a Technology Analyst at Infosys Limited, where his work involves developing datawarehousing and B2B applications. Having close to six years experience in creating data pipelines and reporting, he is passionate about data analytics and is actively looking to transition to a data scientist role. Besides the work and education, he likes to spend his time reading and exploring music,movies and philosophy.

work.summary: Over the course of six years at Infosys Limited, Jishnu has worked on developing data warehousing systems for clients in the Manufacturing domain. This involved building data pipelines for pulling organizational data from diverse source systems to a single data warehouse and data marts. He has also worked on creating B2B applications to facilitate the exchange of business documents between organizations and its trading partners.

education.institution: Sree Chitra Thirunal College of Engineering

skills.name: Data Collection, Cleaning, Visualization
keywords: Python (Pandas, Numpy, Scipy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Bokeh, Plotly, BeautifulSoup)

skills.name: Data Mining
keywords: Unsupervised Learning(Clustering, Density Estimation, Itemset Mining)

references.name: Sujay Kumar (Associate Consultant, Infosys Limited)
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Jishnu, his performance working as a Technology Analyst for Infosys proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
